StringTable.Label: ResearchCharge_Dec
StringTable.String: An archive of nearly limitless knowledge. By activating it we can instantly complete our current research.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Complete Current Research[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: SocialConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to produce anything we need. Activating it allows us to make instant progress on a selected planet's social project.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+100 Planet Production[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MilitaryConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Remnant of an ancient race of slavers. When activated it inspires productivity and boosts production at the selected shipyard.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+500 Shipyard Production[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: A shard from the heart of creation. Activating it significantly increases the Influence of the selected planet.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+500 Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetClass_Dec
StringTable.String: This artifact produces material rich with proto-organic matter. This matter can improve the class of any world we use it on.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Usable Tiles, +1 Farming[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetRepair_Dec
StringTable.String: These Nanites will immediately rebuild themselves according to the architectural records of the ship they are exposed to.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Fully Repairs Fleet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetResetMoves_Dec
StringTable.String: Extra-dimensional materials are consumed quickly, but will give a temporary boost the movement of a fleet.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Resets Fleet Moves[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetIncreaseMoves_Dec
StringTable.String: Extra-dimensional materials are consumed quickly, but will give this fleet a permanent boost to movement speed.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Fleet Moves[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: This ruined Arnor weapon can be harvested for power sources that will improve the attack of the selected fleet.[BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Attack[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=WarRed]Target fleet must have weapons.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetExp_Dec
StringTable.String: By bonding our command staff to the ship itself we can create a fleet that is more responsive and reactive than our enemies.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10 Experience Points[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Folding materials across dimensions produces plating stronger than physics would allow, increasing the defense of the selected fleet.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight] +15 Defense[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetHitpoints_Dec
StringTable.String: Activating this symbol of the Arnor will apply some measure of this permanence to the selected fleet, increasing its hit points.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Hit Points[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Wormhole_Dec
StringTable.String: This former part of a galactic relay lies dormant. Activating it will send a selected fleet somewhere, but we have no control over where.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Randomly Teleport Fleet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FOWReveal_Dec
StringTable.String: This Precursor artifact was left here for unknown reasons. It allows us to see a given area of space in great detail.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Reveal an Area of the Map[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetDamage_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to warp space with a beam capable of inflicting heavy damage on an entire enemy fleet.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]25% Damage[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: SpawnOverlord_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to transmit a stream of Nanites to any part of the galaxy and instantly construct a warship.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawn a Cruiser class ship[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: CagedMonster_Dec
StringTable.String: A creature was forced out of another dimension and trapped in ours. We could release it, but it may go after us as well.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawn a minor Space Monster[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: SpaceMonster_Dec
StringTable.String: This beacon will call a monster from distant space. But beware, it doesn't grant any control over the monster.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawn a powerful Space Monster[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetPopulation_Dec
StringTable.String: This self-sustaining habitat can be deployed on any planet and comes complete with a synthetic workforce.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Yor Citizen[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GlobalApproval_Dec
StringTable.String: This device is capable of transmitting a calming wave over all of our worlds, though its influence is temporary.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+25% Approval for 25 months[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetResistance_Dec
StringTable.String: This quantum sensor warns of threats before there is any known indication of their presence.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Resistance[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ConvertDeadWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: An entire ecosystem is contained within this sphere. By deploying it to dead worlds, the entire world will come alive.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Convert a Dead World to a Class 5 Planet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetApproval_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Approval[/COLOR] of the target world by 10% for 25 months. Creates a sustained sense of satisfaction and contentment among the inhabitants.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Approval[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetCrime_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Approval[/COLOR] of the target world for 25 months. Permanently increases the world's [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Crime[/COLOR].[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-20% Approval[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetPollution_Dec
StringTable.String: Capable of filtering an entire planet's atmosphere.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-20% Pollution[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GalacticFestival_Dec
StringTable.String: Holding a grand festival on all of our worlds will improve our [HS=HS_Tourism]Tourism[/HS] for 12 months.

StringTable.Label: ImpressCitizens_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people are owned by you. It is time they remember. Will provide a Colony Ship and a Constructor

StringTable.Label: DraftColonists_Dec
StringTable.String: Sometimes we can't afford to wait for volunteers. This will provide a free Colony ship.[BR][BR]Reduces [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 10 turns.

StringTable.Label: ImpressConstructors_Dec
StringTable.String: We need a Constructor Ship and we need it now.[BR][BR]Reduces [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 10 turns.

StringTable.Label: MartialLaw_Dec
StringTable.String: Improves your [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and reduces [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 50 turns.

StringTable.Label: IllicitDeals_Dec
StringTable.String: There are those that want our favor and are happy to pay for it. This will provide Credits but increase [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] across our civilization.

StringTable.Label: PrintMoney_Dec
StringTable.String: Printing money can provide short-term wealth at the cost of inflation, which lowers [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for approximately a year.

StringTable.Label: ExploitNature_Dec
StringTable.String: In times of need, we can exploit government land of all their resources. This will create a significant Pollution problem for a full year.

StringTable.Label: ExhortGovernors_Dec
StringTable.String: Our governors will generously donate to our cause. But they won't like it. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Provides 100 Credits per Governor[/COLOR][BR][BR]Reduces Governor Loyalty for 20 turns.

StringTable.Label: InviteLeaders_Dec
StringTable.String: Searching for our most talented will provide 3 new leaders for recruitment.

StringTable.Label: CallElection_Dec
StringTable.String: Reform your government into one which offers increased bonuses, but will also increase your citizens' [HS=HS_Expectations]Expectations[/HS].

StringTable.Label: ColonialSupplies_Dec
StringTable.String: Making a large shipment of supplies to our colonies will reduce their [HS=HS_ColonyDecay]Decay[/HS] for 25 months.

StringTable.Label: PressureScientists_Dec
StringTable.String: Putting pressure on our scientists will result in an immediate +50 [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS].

StringTable.Label: InspireScientists_Dec
StringTable.String: Inspiring our scientists will result in an immediate +50 [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS].

StringTable.Label: DistantVision_Dec
StringTable.String: Using a Precursor artifact we can peer into a distant part of space.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Reveal an Area of the Map[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: TelescopeTakeover_Dec
StringTable.String: Private corporations have advanced survey equipment which we can put to immediate use. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Reveal an Area of the Map[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DraftCivilianShips_Dec
StringTable.String: Security is more important than private ownership. This will provide three free defenders.[BR][BR]Reduces [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 25 turns.

StringTable.Label: MassMobilization_Dec
StringTable.String: Shared sense of duty makes it easy to find volunteers willing to fight. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawns a free transport[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: CrimeWave_Dec
StringTable.String: Organize entire criminal networks with the pull of a few strings. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Creates a crime wave on the target planet, increasing [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] by 200% for 24 months.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ExploitPopulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Take advantage of an entire empire's labor force.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+150% to all planets outputs for 5 months.[BR][/COLOR][BR]Reduces [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 15 turns.

StringTable.Label: GoodWillTour_Dec
StringTable.String: Go on a Goodwill Tour to improve your Diplomacy with foreign civilizations. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Diplomacy for 30 months[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ForcedOvertime_Dec
StringTable.String: More work gets done at the targeted shipyard but your citizens won't be happy.[BR][BR]Improves your [HS=HS_Military]Military[/HS] for 10 turns and reduces [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 30 turns.

StringTable.Label: DefenseSentinels_Artifact_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides a guardian drone for the selected colony. Defense drones can protect against minor attacks but can't leave the planet.

StringTable.Label: QuestArtifact_OrbOfDraginol_Artifact_Dec
StringTable.String: An artifact with the power to open a pocket universe where the Orb of Draginol is said to be hidden.

StringTable.Label: ImpressForeignFleet_Dec
StringTable.String: Take control of another civilization's fleet that is within your borders. Cannot be used on fleets you are at war with.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-3 Diplomacy with origin civilization for 50 months[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddSurveyModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows target starship to be able to survey anomalies.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Flag Module[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Unlock_Upgrade_FoodReplicator_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides food for extended voyages, increasing the ship's range.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5 Ship Range[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GuiltMagnifier_Dec
StringTable.String: Makes people feel more guilty about doing the wrong thing.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Crime]-5% Crime[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Found_WeaponJammer_Dec
StringTable.String: We didn't steal this. We found it.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5 Evasion[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddEnergyWeapon_Dec
StringTable.String: When installed on a ship, the Energy Infuser enhances the vessel's energy weapons.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Beam Attack[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=WarRed]Target fleet must have Beam weapons.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddMissileWeapon_Dec
StringTable.String: Enhances your ship's offensive capabilities by adding superior missile firepower.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Missile Attack[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=WarRed]Target fleet must have Missile weapons.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddKineticWeapon_Dec
StringTable.String: Unleash an ancient and powerful kinetic force, enhancing your ship's firepower.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Kinetic Attack[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=WarRed]Target fleet must have Kinetic weapons.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddTacticalThrusterUpgradeModule_Dec
StringTable.String: This module harnesses advanced technology to significantly increase the combat speed and maneuverability of any ship it is applied to.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+25% Tactical Speed[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddEngineUpgradeModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the Hyperspace speed of a target ship.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Moves[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddPlanetaryPollutionRemoverModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Pollution on a colony by efficiently breaking down harmful particles and toxins.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-10% Pollution[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddShipArmorModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides increased armor defense for a target ship.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Armor[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddPlanetaryBroadcasterModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Amplifies a planet's Influence over surrounding systems.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+500 Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddPlanetaryCultureModule_Dec
StringTable.String: When applied, it finds previously undiscovered points of interest on a planet resulting in increased cultural significance for that world.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Cultural Input[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddPlanetaryDefenseModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides an additional layer of defense against invasions to a target planet.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+30 Planetary Defense[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddEnemyDestablizerModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Promotes criminal activity on a target foreign world.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10 Crime[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddEnemyDefenseSabotageModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Wrecks the enemy's ability to defend against invasions. Target a planet to use.[BR][BR][COLOR=WarRed]Must be at war with target.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddPropagandizeEnemyCitizensModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Drastically reduces the Influence of a target foreign planet.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-5 Influence Growth[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddPoisonEnemyPlanetModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Dramatically reduces the fertility of a target foreign world in a month.[BR][BR][COLOR=WarRed]Must be at war with target.[/COLOR][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-10 Farming[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DepleteEnemyPlanetResourcesModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Oxidizes minerals on a target foreign world, reduces the planet's mineral value.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-2 Minerals[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddFriendlyPlanetMineralScanner_Dec
StringTable.String: One time use scanner finds previously unknown sources of minerals on a target world of ours.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Minerals[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddFriendlyPlanetTechFinderModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Locates previously undiscovered bits of technology left over from the Precursors, increasing the planet's base tech rating.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Technology[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddSummonLeaderToServeYouModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Summons a friendly Precursor constructed Yor advisor.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Yor Leader[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddRoboticServantsForPlanetModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Adds a friendly Yor servant to a target core world.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Yor Citizen[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AddRoboticStarDrone_Dec
StringTable.String: Instantly constructs a small but lethal weapons drone.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawn a Corvette class ship[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DeathCommandos_Dec
StringTable.String: Unleash your most fatalistic and experienced forces for a targeted attack. [BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Reduces HP of each ship in enemy fleet by 25%.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: CosmicEye_Dec
StringTable.String: Use the Cosmic Eye to reveal a part of the map. If the Cosmic Eye sees another civilization's planet, it has a chance to steal a technology.

StringTable.Label: Pandemonium_Dec
StringTable.String: Use telepathy to affect an entire planet negatively. Choose to lower the [HS=HS_PlanetaryDefense]Planetary Defense[/HS], reduce [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] and [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS], or impair [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Serenity_Dec
StringTable.String: Use telepathy to affect an entire planet positively. Choose to boost [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS], improve [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS], or increase [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] and [HS=HS_Tourism]Tourism[/HS].

StringTable.Label: ForcedLabor_Dec
StringTable.String: The people are working hard. They could be working harder.[BR][BR]Reduces [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 12 turns.

StringTable.Label: ForcedTraining_Dec
StringTable.String: Trains thralls to increase target fleet experience.

StringTable.Label: RushNewCitizen_Dec
StringTable.String: Without using Durantium we can recycle scraps to quickly produce more citizens.

StringTable.Label: FleetIncreaseMovesEO_Dec
StringTable.String: Use our executive powers to focus our efforts onto a single fleet to optimize its speed.

StringTable.Label: MilitaryConstructionEO_Dec
StringTable.String: Focus our efforts to quickly supply manufacturing resources to a specific shipyard.

StringTable.Label: InfluenceBroadcast_Dec
StringTable.String: This module contains an optimized message certain to make others wish to assimilate to our culture.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+300 Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetTiles_Dec
StringTable.String: Increase this planet's use to our species. Adds +3 to its usable tiles. Should only be used on Core worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Usable Tiles[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Recapitalize_Dec
StringTable.String: Generate new capital through recapitalization with your reserve currency status.

StringTable.Label: SpawnMiner_Dec
StringTable.String: Engage skilled miners to extract valuable resources efficiently and boost your productivity.

StringTable.Label: SpawnFreighter_Dec
StringTable.String: Contract experienced merchants to man a ship to expand your trade routes.

StringTable.Label: AddSiege_Dec
StringTable.String: Install shock troopers on target ship to assist in conquering worlds.

StringTable.Label: GiveHope_Dec
StringTable.String: Give a series of inspirational speeches to the target core world to increase their [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 25 turns.

StringTable.Label: Mitosis_Dec
StringTable.String: Induce Mitosis in an Irradiated Citizen on a target planet.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Citizen[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Swarm_Dec
StringTable.String: For six months all members of our species that have the [HS=HS_Consuming]Consuming[/HS] will see their abilities doubled.

StringTable.Label: PlanetVision_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly expand the sensor vision of the target world to see what is remotely near it. Effect begins one month later.
